code:
-spec special_perm(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
special_perm(Nums) ->
    Mod = 1000000007,
    Sorted = lists:sort(Nums),
    N = length(Nums),
    DP = array:new([{size, 1 bsl N}, {default, 0}, {fixed, true}]),
    
    Count = fun Count(_, 0) -> 1;
                Count(Pos, Mask) ->
                    case array:get(Mask, DP) of
                        0 ->
                            Sum = lists:foldl(
                                fun(I, Acc) ->
                                    if
                                        Mask band (1 bsl I) =:= 0 ->
                                            Num = lists:nth(I + 1, Sorted),
                                            Good = lists:any(
                                                fun(J) ->
                                                    (Mask band (1 bsl J) =/= 0) andalso
                                                    ((Num rem lists:nth(J + 1, Sorted) == 0) orelse (lists:nth(J + 1, Sorted) rem Num == 0))
                                                end,
                                                lists:seq(0, N - 1)
                                            ),
                                            if
                                                Pos == 1 orelse Good ->
                                                    (Acc + Count(Pos - 1, Mask bor (1 bsl I))) rem Mod;
                                                true ->
                                                    Acc
                                            end;
                                        true ->
                                            Acc
                                    end
                                end,
                                0,
                                lists:seq(0, N - 1)
                            ),
                            array:set(Mask, Sum, DP),
                            Sum;
                        Sum -> Sum
                    end
            end,
    
    lists:foldl(fun(_, Acc) -> (Count(N, 0) + Acc) rem Mod end, 0, lists:seq(1, N)).
